id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [MQTT Subscribe Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mqtt_subscribe.html#configuration-variables)*

topic.docs:
**string**: The MQTT topic to listen for numeric messages.



*See also: [MQTT Subscribe Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mqtt_subscribe.html#configuration-variables)*

qos.docs:
**int**: The MQTT QoS to subscribe with. Defaults to `0`.



*See also: [MQTT Subscribe Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mqtt_subscribe.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [MQTT Subscribe Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/mqtt_subscribe.html#configuration-variables)*

topic.docs:
**string**: The MQTT topic to listen for numeric messages.



*See also: [MQTT Subscribe Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/mqtt_subscribe.html#configuration-variables)*

qos.docs:
**int**: The MQTT QoS to subscribe with. Defaults to `0`.
